post.body: We need to take food to Colombia. I can eat a banana in Colombia too.
"Santa can bring me my own tools. Because he's soft and that will be good for Santa."
"When u were born u were a lil baby remember Dada? It was nice 4u 2b born now but that was a big storm and a good day for you 2b a big baby.
"Malu moves her head just like those guys in the Tegan and Sarah video" http://tinyurl.com/ytvfn3
"It's snowing! We can build an igloo and sleep in it."
"Ita (grandma) is my favorite girl. And she's the best smoothie-giver."
"The airplane says arriba and abajo. And something in Spanish."
After sitting on Santa's lap. "Santa is soft."
q:"what do you think of the economy?' a:"I complained. But then I ate a blueberry."
Seated in back seat of car: "The moon wears a hat and goes to the party and eats cake on a plate. And the moon and sun have faces."
r:"Mommy, this necklace takes too long." M:"to make?" R:"No, to sell."
